These symptoms are present for about 3 days. she is a 51 yr old f embalmer. o:Height 68 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

td.content: s:a 51 yo white f embalmer presents with 13 months history of Body Aches. o:Height 67 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cefuroxime axetil - 500 mg 2x day.

s:patient complained of Body Aches. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. patient is a F embalmer aged 51 ys. o:Height 68 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 14 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents with 17 months history of Body Aches. she is a 51 YO white female embalmer. o:Height 68 in, Weight 201 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered B burgdorferi IgG Serum.
